response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is valued at $10,000 by us. However, considering your anticipated use and appreciation for the product, we are willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
